milestone.name: Ecosystem Context Hub
milestone.description: Complete meta-repository providing ecosystem context, architecture docs, and session initialization for all jadecli projects

tasks.title: Initial repository setup with submodules
tasks.description: Create jade-ecosystem-assist meta-repository with .gitmodules for all 10 projects, ASCII architecture scaffolds, and platform setup guides.

feature.description: Meta-repository providing read-only references to all ecosystem projects
feature.benefit: Single source for ecosystem context and architecture documentation

tasks.title: Add automated submodule sync workflow
tasks.description: Create GitHub Actions workflow that periodically updates submodule references to track upstream changes. Should run weekly and on manual trigger.

feature.description: Weekly automated sync of submodule references
feature.benefit: Keep ecosystem context up-to-date without manual intervention
acceptance_criteria: Workflow runs on schedule (weekly) and manual dispatch
Updates all submodule references to latest commits
Includes commit summary in PR description

tasks.title: Add context generation script
tasks.description: Create script that generates consolidated context.md from all scaffold files, suitable for piping to Claude Code sessions.

feature.description: Script to generate session context from scaffolds
feature.benefit: Easier context loading for new Claude Code sessions
acceptance_criteria: Script combines all scaffold files into single context.md
Can be run standalone or via jade-start --context

tasks.title: Add ecosystem health check aggregator
tasks.description: Script that runs health checks across all projects and reports consolidated status. Uses each project's native health check commands.

feature.description: Unified health check for entire ecosystem
feature.benefit: Quick verification that all projects are in working state
acceptance_criteria: Checks each project using its native test/health command
Reports pass/fail status for each project

tasks.title: Set up jade-claude-settings with standard project patterns
tasks.description: Add jade-claude-settings to the ecosystem with the same patterns as other jadecli projects: GitHub Project board, CI workflow, PR template, tasks.json, commitlint, and CLAUDE.md.

feature.description: Fully integrate jade-claude-settings into ecosystem tooling
feature.benefit: Consistent project patterns across all 11 repos
acceptance_criteria: GitHub Project board created and linked to repo
CLAUDE.md added for Claude Code context
Tasks synced to GitHub Project board
